meanings.definition: The line formed by the lower edge of a garment, such as a skirt or dress.
meanings.sent1: She adjusted the hemlines of her skirt to make it shorter.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer decided to raise the hemlines of the new collection.
meanings.sent3: The hemlines of the dress were so long, they almost touched the floor!
meanings.sent4: As the music played, the dancers' hemlines swayed gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The tailor carefully measured the hemlines to ensure they were even.

meanings.definition: The length of a garment as measured from the lower edge.
meanings.sent1: Her dress had elegant hemlines that accentuated her figure.
meanings.sent2: The hemlines of the coat were perfect for the winter weather.
meanings.sent3: The hemlines of the pants were so short, they looked like shorts!
meanings.sent4: The hemlines of the curtains brushed against the floor gently.
meanings.sent5: The tailor recommended adjusting the hemlines for a better fit.
